subject: Weight Lifting
Steroids
Body Building
lead_paragraph: Patrick Antonecchia competed in powerlifting and strong man events for more than 25 years until his doctors told him to stop. He received a diagnosis of severe kidney damage after years of using steroids.
snippet: Patrick Antonecchia competed in powerlifting and strong man events for more than 25 years until his doctors told him to stop. He received a diagnosis of severe kidney damage after years of using steroids.
